      • pulsesLeft

        public int pulsesLeft()
        Description copied from class: AbstractRateCounter
        Get the number of pulses left for the current time slot. If the slot is finished, does not create a new slot.
        Specified by:
        pulsesLeft in class AbstractRateCounter
        Returns:
        number of pulses left in the current slot. Could be negative if the limited is exceeded.

      • millisecondsLeft

        public long millisecondsLeft()

      • countPulse

        public boolean countPulse()
        Description copied from class: AbstractRateCounter
        Register a pulse. Creates new slot now and resets counter if the current slot is finished or there is no current slot, what could happen after the reset.

        Important. A new slot must always be created with this call. The time between the end of the current slot and the first call to the AbstractRateCounter.countPulse() does not count.

        Specified by:
        countPulse in class AbstractRateCounter
        Returns:
        true if the limit is not exceeded after counting the pulse.
